response.overview: The film tells, in a curious narrative structure of flashbacks and hypotheses, the true story of a giallo that took place in Taormina in the mid-1950s, the drowning of a female tourist on a boat trip off Isola Bella with her husband; the facts lead back to a fortuitous fall into the water but the man is accused of murder and put on a pressing trial.
response.title: L'altro piatto della bilancia
